entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers at times heavy beginning early this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High 15. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
